definition: strenuous effort, be engaged in a fight
details:
noun
- strenuous effort
= example: strenuous effort
- an energetic attempt to achieve something
= example: an energetic attempt to achieve something
= synonyms: battle
- an open clash between two opposing groups (or individuals)
= synonyms: battle, conflict
verb
- be engaged in a fight
= synonyms: fight
- to exert strenuous effort against opposition
= example: to exert strenuous effort against opposition
- climb awkwardly, as if by scrambling
= synonyms: clamber
- make a strenuous or labored effort
= example: make a strenuous or labored effort
= synonyms: fight
